entry.title: For science

Author: BurningBridges17

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,416Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 31

Summary: Buck accidentally serves Eddie with divorce papers.Â Eddie was standing in the living room, phone clenched in his hand. He didnâ€™t yell. Not yet. He held the phone up, screen glowing, and said very clearly, â€œWhy am I getting divorce papers?â€Buck froze. His smile vanished, eyes widening as recognition hit all at once. His brain scrambled, pieces clicking together too late. â€œOh,â€ Buck said. â€œIt really was that easy?â€Eddieâ€™s jaw tightened.Buck took a step forward automatically, hands lifting like he could calm this with his body alone. â€œOkay, so, hear me outâ€”â€

entry.title: but all i see is you

Author: kryptonian

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,638Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 164

Summary: He sighs, frustrated, with the world, with himself, with the stupid, mediocre beer heâ€™s drinking that cost him twelve damn dollars, before tip even.â€œThe club isnâ€™t the problem,â€ Eddie mumbles, staring across the dance floor, where Buck is curving his hand around the womanâ€™s head and whispering in her ear.â€œIs the problem that your wingman is a traitor?â€ Ravi asks, snickering at the sight.â€œNo. The problem is I donâ€™t want to pick up women.â€ Eddie really hopes thatâ€™s enough information. Ravi is a smart guy. He kind of hopes heâ€™ll piece it together. Though another part of him, a soft, new part of him, hopes Ravi doesnâ€™t. He hopes he has to say it. He should probably get some practice in, right?Â Ravi looks at him then, studying him. â€œYouâ€™re really happy being single?â€Eddie exhales. Smiles small and shakes his head.Â â€œNo, itâ€™s not that,â€ he says. â€œIâ€™m just gay.â€OR Eddie comes out at the club during 9x07. Just not to Buck.

entry.title: Just one more breath
entry.summary:
Author: CarpeDiem911

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 74,619Chapters: 24/?Kudos: 303

Summary: The hysterical laughter stole every coherent thought from Buck and crawled into his bones; his heart thudded and he stared at the doll in disbelief. Then, as suddenly as it had started, the laughter stopped; leaving an eerie silence. Buck stood frozen, his thoughts like thick mud, staring at that stupid doll. He completely missed the huge hole in the wall above the tub. He missed the shadow standing there, watching him from behind the hole with cold eyes and a malicious smile.

entry.title: Yellow means Happy
entry.summary:
Author: peterscrime

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,206Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 22

Summary: June, a traumatized two-year-old girl, has been placed in the care of Buck and Eddie, as they navigate the challenges of welcoming her into their home. The first few days prove difficult as June struggles to adjust to her new surroundings. As June begins to engage more with family life, eating better and allowing Buck and Eddie to provide comfort, a shocking revelation comes to light. June has a twin brother, Jonah, who was separated from her during their removal from their birth parents due to a miscommunication between counties.As the Buckley-Diaz family continues to navigate the complexities of welcoming these now two traumatized children into their lives, they remain steadfast in their commitment to providing a loving, nurturing environment where June and Jonah can heal and thrive. With the twins reunited and the support of their new family, the future holds the promise of a fresh start and the opportunity for June and Jonah to build the strong bond they were once denied.

entry.title: Where the Coffee Comes with a Bullet to the Heart
entry.summary:
Author: Noel803

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,521Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 87

Summary: Eddie Diazâ€™s order was simple: become a regular at the 118, a coffee house with suspected ties to organized crime. His captain wanted him to get close to the staff so they could expose the truth behind their overly polite smiles, suspiciously well-priced coffee, and ever shifting open hours. Only Eddie wasnâ€™t supposed to get this close. But damn it, how was he supposed to avoid falling for the hot barista behind the counter who always signed his cup with a heart. Lines between personal and professional, right and wrong, love and danger soon become a hazy memory and fuck it if Eddie cares.Or the coffee-shop-mafia Buddie AU that nobody asked me for!
